Counter Strike, une lignée de jeux mythique dont découle CS GO ce jeu emblématique, une référence en terme de compétition depuis 8 ans. Base de tout FPS compétitif, un jeu de base sur PC qui permet une amélioration sur tout autre jeu au niveau du crosshaire placement, game sens ou encore AIM. Incontestablement le meilleur jeu de tout le temps ! Jouer à CS GO est une étape obligatoire dans la vie d'un gamer. De plus il est maintenant gratuit ce qui permet à tout le monde de se faire la main avant d'acheter le jeu pour obtenir le statue prime et un trust facteur plus élevé ou si l'on ne veut pas payer, atteindre le niveau 21 (~150h de jeu). finalement je le recommande à 100%.

ARKADAŞLAR DLC GELDİ SONUNDA. ARTIK GOOGLE TARAFINDAN ONAYLANAN SİTELER TARAFINDAN , BU SİTELERE ERİŞMEK İÇİN 'CS HACKS' YAZIN, DLC LERİ EDİNEBİLİRSİNİZ. KESİNLİKLE BAN RİSKİ YOK. HAFTALARDIR KARŞIMA HİLE GELİYOR SANIYORDUM. DİYORUM NİYE BAN YEMİYOLAR AQ. BUGÜN ÖĞRENDİM ONLAR DLC ALMIŞLAR. NEYSE BENDE ALMAYA GİDİYORUM. İYİ OYUNLAR


Amına kodumun oyununda ya hile geliyor ya hile geliyor. Anasını sikeyim 10 maç atıyoruz 12-13 ünde karşı hile. E biz ne sikime para veriyoruz hilesiz oynayacaz diye ? Su bacısını tokatladıgımın hilesini DLC olarak getirinde herkes rahatlasın amk.
Buen juego la verdad. Dea re que es malardo y lleno de falsedades o cosas tilteantes

El juego en si esta muy bueno, pero las actualizaciones y optimizaciones para atras,juego totalmente microdependiente... podes tener la mejor placa de video del mundo, pero si tenes un micro medio pelo, olvidate, no lo bajes...

Don't get me wrong, if you can find a game without cheaters, you'll have a great time. But 7 time out of 10 you'll be in a game with a closet cheater or someone who is just blatant. I would not recommend this game to people who hate being headshot through walls. 

Good Skins Though
Very Fun game, now that its free to play, hackers are more common but a very fun experience none the less. get your mates together and have a blast.
Best FPS to play if u hate CoD

It's a game I grew up playing (Since 1.6). It's a unique game that takes awhile to master. Even by the time I'm bored to death, I continue to play this because the more you understand how to play it, the better it gets. Sadly, the only way to understand this is to go through that boring phase. All that does, loves this game as much as I do. It's a game I'll play til it dies down. Let's keep this alive!!!
